Translations.Text: Ger yimdanen, win iaabden Oebbi, $ef rrif. Ma iusa t id lxio, ad ithenni yis. Ma iusa t id uhewwel, ad iswexxeo udem is. Oueent as, ddunit, laxeot. Ayagi d lexsaoa n uuee
Ipnuju, war Oebbi, ar wayen ur t neiiuoou, ur t neffaa. D wagi ay d ttelfan u$miq
Ipnuju ar bu vveoo izwaren aba$uo ines. Ay d bab ucmit, ay d acrik ucmit
Oebbi, s tidep, ad Issekcem wid iumnen, i ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar Loennet, ddaw as isaffen ppazzalen. Oebbi, s tidep, Ixeddem ayen Ib$a
Win i oaalen ur t Ipsellik ara Oebbi, di ddunit, di laxeot, ad iaalleq amrar s igenni, sinna, ad igzem nnefs is. Ad ieeo ma tieeeoci s temea ayen i t irean
Akka ay t id Nessader, d issekniyen iberrzen. U Oebbi, s tidep, Inehhu win i S ihwan
Ih, ass n tnekra, ad Ieudd Oebbi ger wid iumnen, udayen, iuabiyen, imasieiyen, u iaabbaden n tmes, wid ipcaraken. Oebbi, s tidep, Iwala yal cci

Ur twalav ara knan i Oebbi i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt: iiij, aggur, itran, idurar, ttjuo, leayawan, aias n yimdanen. Aaaqeb d lewoeb $ef aias. Win Isdull Oebbi, ur illi w ara t iauzzen. Ih, Oebbi Ixeddem ayen i S ihwan
Atnan sin ixuimen ppemqellaan $ef Mass nnsen. S tmes ay pwafeulen iceiiiven n wid ijehlen. Ad mmiren, $ef iqweooa nnsen, waman io$an
ara issefsin ayen illan deg iaabbav nnsen, akked igwelman
Yal tikelt ara ssirmen a d ff$en segs, seg wakken meenen, a ten rren $uoes: "jeoobet aaaqeb n tmeo$iwt
